doc.author: duanximeng
doc.description: 传送网-省际干线指标录入

sql.name: transportnetworkinterprovincialroutequartyreportpage.group
sql.item: select t.groupname from ( select g.c630000018 groupname from {100} g where g.c630000021='2' and g.c630000020='000000000600001' and g.c630000027='1' union all select trim('网管中心') groupname from dual ) t

sql.name: transportnetworkinterprovincialroutequartyreport.group
transportnetworkinterprovincialroutequartyreport.left
sql.item: select ' ',trim('省际长途网-管道长度(公里)') as 指标名称 from dual union all select ' ',trim('省际长途网-光缆长度(皮长公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省际长途网-光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省际长途网-租用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)') from dual union all select ' ',trim('省际长途网-光缆纤芯长度-已占用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)') from dual

sql.name: transportnetworkinterprovincialroutequartyreport.centervalue
sql.item: select trim('省际长途网-管道长度(公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000004) from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际长途网-光缆长度(皮长公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000005) from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际长途网-光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000006) from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际长途网-租用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000010) from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002 union all select trim('省际长途网-光缆纤芯长度-已占用光缆纤芯长度(芯公里)'),t.c802000002 as 部门,sum(t.c802000011) from {100} t where 1=1 {5} group by t.c802000002
